msg: Synch with 0.9 (the times you forget to check for a bug in HEAD are

author: jorton
msg: * xlate/xlate.c (check_sbcs): Remove function which made unsafe
assumptions (a theoretical issue), and was buggy in not resetting the
iconv handle on failure (the cause of at least one real issue).
